```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library(shiny)
```

```{r cars}
summary(cars)

```

```{r, echo = FALSE}
shinyApp(
  
  ui = fluidPage(
    plotOutput("carsplot")
  ),
  
  server = function(output) {
    output$carsplot <- renderPlot({
      plot(cars$speed,cars$dist)
    })
  },
  
  options = list(height = 500)
)
```
